title: administrator privileges
extract: If you are unable to open Command Prompt as an administrator, press "Windows-R" and type the command "runas /user:administrator cmd" (without the quotes) into the Run box. Press "Enter" to invoke the Command Prompt with administrator privileges.
extract_html: If you are unable to open Command Prompt as an administrator, press "Windows-R" and type the command "runas /user:administrator cmd" (without the quotes) into the Run box. Press "Enter" to invoke the Command Prompt with administrator privileges.
